TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
No. 4:45 is 0.0(8).

What is this, sitting on your shoulder?

A chip.

Wood block or block wood?

Whatever makes Woody Blockpecker happppppppppy.

Is Zenozoik Clash world real?

(I hope, it was)

Edited February 12, 2022 by kerbiloid

ZokZok Crash? The game Jeb added a virus?

Is 401k free money?

Yes. For others, but not for you.

Why so?

So so so so so so low.

Why go?

To not stay.

Why ask why?

Ask Who why because Who knows why we ask why of Who asks.

Does your head hurt now?

Yep, since GooseGooseStop is operational.

Should we go to Jool to never stay?

Of course, because motion is life.

Is workout a good idea in space?

Work in your projects!

Should we turn in our fake IDs to the cellophane?

If someone stood up in a crowd
And raised his voice up way out loud
And waved his arm and shook his leg
You'd notice him

If someone in the movie show
Yelled, "Fire", in the second row
This whole place is a powder keg
You'd notice him

And even without clucking like a hen
Everyone gets noticed, now and then
Unless of course, that personage should be
Invisible, inconsequential m

Cellophane, Mr. Cellophane shoulda been my name
Mr. Cellophane 'cause you can look right through me
Walk right by me and never know I'm there

I tell ya Cellophane, Mr. Cellophane shoulda been my name
Mr. Cellophane 'cause you can look right through me
Walk right by me and never know I'm there

Suppose you was a little cat
Residin' in a person's flat
Who fed you fish and scratched your ears?
You'd notice him

Suppose you was a woman, wed
And sleepin' in a double bed
Beside one man, for seven years
You'd notice him

A human being's made of more than air
With all that bulk, you're bound to see him there
Unless that human bein' next to you
Is unimpressive, undistinguished you know who

Cellophane, Mr. Cellophane shoulda been my name
Mr. Cellophane 'cause you can look right through me
Walk right by me and never know I'm there

I tell ya Cellophane, Mr. Cellophane shoulda been my name
Mr. Cellophane 'cause you can look right through me
Walk right by me and never know I'm there
Never even know I'm there

Hope I didn't take up too much of your time

Have you seen Chicago?

No I haven't.

Have you seen @kerbiloid?

Maybe, but it had a different Profile picture.

Have you seen Dres?

Yesn't, as it does unexist.

Is "to be" the same as "to do be doing being"?

Boom.

Is there a giant thermometer on a random hill?

Grammercy!

Where are my map

We took it to put a mark where the grammercy shop is situated.

Or is it a colloquial name for one thousandth part of kilogrammercy?

An ounce of mercy is not weak.

Do you think that building planes is more fun?

Yes. The planes are funny.

Why do they call it a "runway" when the planes don't run, they fly.

It's because the planes run away from their extended warranty people.

Why is Google saying it's up but it's not pointing up?

Why not?

(both answer and question)

Because it is javascript:void('FontSize')

Is it because it is?

It could be.

Was it when or is it not then?

It wis wthen.

Why need ice for figure skating?
